mapper.sql: id, company_id, user_id, user_name,sex, relation_type, audit_status, employee_type, employee_status, entry_time, departure_time, illustration, phone, email, departure_reason, create_date, create_by, update_date, update_by
mapper.select: SELECT a2.id, b2.id as depart_id,ifnull(p2.nick_name,b2.company_name) as depart_name,a2.server_station ,GROUP_CONCAT(d2.name) as role,GROUP_CONCAT(d2.id) as org_roles FROM maoding_web_org_user a2 LEFT JOIN maoding_web_company b2 on a2.org_id=b2.id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_business_partner p2 on p2.company_id=b2.id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_role_user c2 on a2.org_id=c2.org_id and c2.user_id=a2.user_id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_role d2 on c2.role_id=d2.id WHERE a2.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a2.company_id= #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a2.org_id=a2.company_id GROUP BY a2.org_id,a2.user_id UNION ( SELECT * from ( SELECT a1.id, b1.id as depart_id,b1.depart_name, a1.server_station ,GROUP_CONCAT(d1.name) as role,GROUP_CONCAT(d1.id) as org_roles FROM maoding_web_org_user a1 LEFT JOIN maoding_web_depart b1 on a1.org_id=b1.id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_role_user c1 on a1.org_id=c1.org_id and c1.user_id=a1.user_id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_role d1 on c1.role_id=d1.id WHERE a1.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a1.company_id= #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a1.org_id!=a1.company_id GROUP BY a1.org_id,a1.user_id order by a1.seq )a )

SELECT a2.id, b2.id as depart_id,b2.company_short_name as depart_name,a2.server_station ,GROUP_CONCAT(d2.name) as role,GROUP_CONCAT(d2.id) as org_roles FROM maoding_web_org_user a2 LEFT JOIN maoding_web_company b2 on a2.org_id=b2.id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_role_user c2 on a2.org_id=c2.org_id and c2.user_id=a2.user_id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_role d2 on c2.role_id=d2.id WHERE a2.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a2.company_id= #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a2.org_id=a2.company_id GROUP BY a2.org_id,a2.user_id UNION ( SELECT a1.id, b1.id as depart_id,b1.depart_name, a1.server_station ,GROUP_CONCAT(d1.name) as role,GROUP_CONCAT(d1.id) as org_roles FROM maoding_web_org_user a1 LEFT JOIN maoding_web_depart b1 on a1.org_id=b1.id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_role_user c1 on a1.org_id=c1.org_id and c1.user_id=a1.user_id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_role d1 on c1.role_id=d1.id WHERE a1.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a1.company_id= #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a1.org_id!=a1.company_id GROUP BY a1.org_id,a1.user_id )
